name: Go Away Phantoms
description:
Note: You need a display of at least 1500x900 to view everything.

You find yourself being attacked by phantoms and cornered. You only have a firearm and five gernades to defend yourself. The longer you survive, the more phantoms will show up to get you. How long can you fend off the phantoms' attack?

Background Images and Background Music made by Questionvoid.

Remaining Art made by Plant Lizard Thing.

Controls

Left-Click: Fire Gun

Right-Click: Reload Gun

Space: Use Gernade

P: Pause Game
